text: 3.16: Mt 9.22; FG 4.10; 14.9Ŋka Zisas khothɨgi, kha guma nde ana gari, ana vhɨra Zisas khothɨgap, ana Zisas zɨn panan ana suani gum gɨzani ŋkasŋkagim, ana khavgia thɨga rui. Zisas, ana nduara ŋka ana khothɨgim, ana ŋka ana khothɨgi tɨva muuŋgim, ana havhargi. Ŋka ana khothɨgi tɨvara ana kha guma ga muuŋgim, ana ntigem nzerav thiva ruim, nde ntigem ana gari.
